title: Sweet potato and chickpea curry
description: You can whip up this easy chickpea curry with just a few store cupboard staples - perfect for a laid-back supper. This is designed to be a low cost recipeEach serving provides 551kcal, 15.5g protein, 97g carbohydrate (of which 14.5g sugars),	8g fat (of which 1g saturates), 13g fibre and 0.2g salt.
ingredients: 750g/1lb 10oz sweet potato, peeled and cut into bite-sized cubes
